s0501.literal: Yan lord yielded his minister Zi Zhi.
s0501.idiomatic: Yan lord yielded his minister Zi Zhi.

s0502.chinese: 十二年，王與梁王會臨晉。
s0502.literal: Twelfth year, king met with Liang king at Linjin.
s0502.idiomatic: Twelfth year, king met with Liang king at Linjin.

s0503.literal: Senior Minister Ji attacked Zhao, captured Zhao general Zhuang.
s0503.idiomatic: Senior Minister Ji attacked Zhao, captured Zhao general Zhuang.

s0504.literal: Zhang Yi became prime minister of Chu.
s0504.idiomatic: Zhang Yi became prime minister of Chu.

s0505.chinese: 十三年，庶長章擊楚於丹陽，虜其將屈丐，斬首八萬；
s0505.literal: Thirteenth year, Senior Minister Zhang attacked Chu at Danyang, captured their general Qu Gai, beheaded 80,000;
s0505.idiomatic: Thirteenth year, Senior Minister Zhang attacked Chu at Danyang, captured their general Qu Gai, beheaded 80,000;

s0506.chinese: 又攻楚漢中，取地六百里，置漢中郡。
s0506.literal: Again attacked Chu's Hanzhong, took 600 li of land, established Hanzhong commandery.
s0506.idiomatic: Again attacked Chu's Hanzhong, took 600 li of land, established Hanzhong commandery.

s0507.chinese: 楚圍雍氏，秦使庶長疾助韓而東攻齊，到滿助魏攻燕。
s0507.literal: Chu besieged Yongshi, Qin sent Senior Minister Ji to aid Han and attack Qi to the east, Dao Man aided Wei to attack Yan.
s0507.idiomatic: Chu besieged Yongshi, Qin sent Senior Minister Ji to aid Han and attack Qi to the east, Dao Man aided Wei to attack Yan.

s0508.literal: Fourteenth year, attacked Chu, took Shaoling.
s0508.idiomatic: Fourteenth year, attacked Chu, took Shaoling.

s0509.chinese: 丹、犁臣，蜀相壯殺蜀侯來降。
s0509.literal: Dan, Li submitted, Shu chancellor Zhuang killed Shu lord and came to surrender.
s0509.idiomatic: Dan, Li submitted, Shu chancellor Zhuang killed Shu lord and came to surrender.

s0510.literal: Duke Hui died, son Duke Wu ascended.
s0510.idiomatic: Duke Hui died, son Duke Wu ascended.

s0511.literal: Han, Wei, Qi, Chu, Yue all submitted as guests.
s0511.idiomatic: Han, Wei, Qi, Chu, Yue all submitted as guests.

s0512.chinese: 武王元年，與魏惠王會臨晉。
s0512.literal: Duke Wu first year, met with Wei Hui Wang at Linjin.
s0512.idiomatic: Duke Wu first year, met with Wei Hui Wang at Linjin.

s0514.literal: Zhang Yi, Wei Zhang both sent east to Wei.
s0514.idiomatic: Zhang Yi, Wei Zhang both sent east to Wei.

s0516.chinese: 二年，初置丞相，摢裏疾、甘茂為左右丞相。
s0516.literal: Second year, first established chancellor position, Li Ji and Gan Mao became left and right chancellors.
s0516.idiomatic: Second year, first established chancellor position, Li Ji and Gan Mao became left and right chancellors.

s0518.chinese: 三年，與韓襄王會臨晉外。
s0518.literal: Third year, met with Han Xiang Wang outside Linjin.
s0518.idiomatic: Third year, met with Han Xiang Wang outside Linjin.

s0519.literal: Nan Gong Jie died, Li Ji became prime minister of Han.
s0519.idiomatic: Nan Gong Jie died, Li Ji became prime minister of Han.
